001.name: whale
001.text: You need to find a better storage for my snacks

002.name: whale
002.text: To get you back home to the other tide, is a loooong swim

003.name: whale
003.text: My blubber is getting thin. I need my snack or I will die

004.name: whale
004.text: Maybe one of the planets will have one for trade?
